title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. II, pt. 206 - Equity Method Of Accounting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. II, pt. 206 - Equity Method Of Accounting

State Regulations
§ 206.1 - Equity method of accounting for investments in subsidiaries

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. II, pt. 206

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 39[5], 14[1][g], 104

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
